title: 2005년 Parsons 사건
summary: 미국 Michigan, MI 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Parsons. 판결일: 2005-09-28. 법원: Michigan Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: People v. Parsons
**판결일**: 2005-09-28
**법원**: Michigan Supreme Court
**관할**: Michigan, MI

## 인용

- 703 N.W.2d 813

## 판결문 요약


703 N.W.2d 813 (2005)
PEOPLE v. PARSONS.
No. 128394.
Supreme Court of Michigan.
September 28, 2005.
Application for Leave to Appeal.
SC: 128394, COA: 259473.
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the February 17, 2005 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
...
